## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description              | Type      | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ------------------------ | --------- | ----------- |

| `disabled` | `disabled` | Disable                  | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `label`    | `label`    | labels of the checkboxes | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `name`     | `name`     | Checkbox name            | `string`  | `undefined` |
